RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Strum Notes
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Adds note delay values for notes on the same row, to get a plucked instrument alike effect. Can be found in the Pattern Editor's context menu (right click some where in the Pattern Editor).
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Vincent Voois [ http://tinyurl.com/vvrns ]
